background: We have a set of flight legs (one-way non-stop flight) with a limited passenger capacity. According to market research, we defined a set of flight itineraries to sell as a package with a given price. For each package, we have an estimated demand. How many units of each package should we sell to maximize the revenue? We reserve the passenger seats according to the number of packages we want to sell.
constraints: Cannot sell more than the demand
Cannot use more of a resource than available
